mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bill_items(item, money, remark, `type`, bill_id) VALUES (#{item}, #{money}, #{remark}, #{type}, #{billId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bills WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND `date`=#{date, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.DateOnlyTypeHandler}

SELECT b.*, bi.*, bi.id as bid FROM bills b, bill_items bi WHERE b.id=bi.bill_id AND user_id=#{userId} AND `date`>=#{from, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.DateOnlyTypeHandler} AND `date`<=#{to, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.DateOnlyTypeHandler}
mapper.delete: DELETE bi.* FROM bill_items bi,bills b WHERE bi.bill_id=b.id AND b.user_id=#{userId} AND bi.id=#{id}
